node.display_long_description:
#1 VR Multiplayer Game for 2020 Holiday!

CLIMB, FLY, BUILD. Battle Royale only possible in VR.
 
Drop into a colorful, near future world with limitless combat possibilities. Welcome to POPULATION: ONE, where you and your squad must fight together to survive until the end. 
 
POPULATION: ONE delivers unparalleled vertical freedom and mobility with its unique Vertical combat System. Fly through the map to rain down bullets from above. Climb anything you see to gain the high ground advantage. Build strategic cover to protect your squad. Use your environment to FIGHT ANYWHERE. 
 
In POPULATION: ONE, the action never stops with ongoing live in-game events and fresh content to explore.

CROSS-BUY - Buy for Rift or Quest and get the other free

latest_supported_binary.change_log: The best version of POP: ONE to date!

nodes.title: Darkest Days Event + War Mode!🌙🦇
nodes.body_text:
January 28, 2021 Change List
The main update week is our Darkest Days and War Mode Event!
This is the last major update until Season 1. Look for more info coming soon!

Darkest Days Event
- Night version of the game map
- Getting the night map is a random chance (more rare than the normal map)
- Removed the ice/snow in Plains
- Gun skin rewards
- Event runs from 1/28 - 2/7 (10 days)

Limited Time War Mode
- 9 vs 9 limited time War Mode (choose via the mode select on the Play Screen)
- Squad up with 1-2 friends as usual, in the match you will be paired with other players to form the 9-person teams
- Longer looting period and then 1 major zone shrink forces the 2 teams to fight
- A man says "The war... has begun" when the major zone shrink happens
- War Mode runs from 1/28 - 2/7 (10 days)

Graphics
- Improved illumination to better preserve detail in low light
- Improved loot item highlights for better readability
- More dynamic & higher quality environment, character, tree, and item lighting
- Multiple light improvements to better support Day and Night
- Misc environment FX Updates

General
- App Launch: New loading bar now shows progress when launching Pop1
- Loading: Fixed initial slow framerate when joining a lobby
- Ammo/Resources: Fixed ejecting duplicates when pulling both triggers & grips at the same time (or other input combinations)
- Ammo/Resources: Fixed issue where dropping 1 ammo/resource dropped a full crate
- Loot: Fixed issue where rarity was always distributed in the same locations every match

Known Issues
- Desktop VR: Climbing jitter can happen in some cases. Actively working on a fix for this.
- Steam VR users playing on an Oculus headset: When Purchasing Bureau Gold, you will need to take off your headset to approve the purchase
- If you see a notice that you need to "update to play" but don't see it in the store, uninstall and reinstall POP: ONE to force the upgrade to happen. You won't lose any progress or data.

​
Can't wait to play these new changes with all of you ~ see you in game!


Follow on Twitter
Follow on Facebook
Follow on Reddit

nodes.title: Weekly POP:ONE update!
nodes.body_text:
January 21, 2021 Change List

Note: All friend codes will change with this update (we fixed the 0O & I1 issues)

Networking

- Bullets: Fixed issue causing slightly offset bullets (affected shooting at a distance, especially noticeable with the AWP)
- Prediction: General improvements to hit detection
- Movement: Fixed issues where players could severely rubber band with a poor network connection

Reticle

- 4 color presets are now available from Settings -> Weapon Settings (Red, Yellow, Pink, or Green)
- Changing the reticle color will update the world UI Reticle, Reflex Lens, and Tunnel Sights

General

- Squads: Assorted fixes for repeat matchmaking failure while in a squad
- Friend Codes: Removed 0 and 1 from friend codes to avoid confusion
- Friends: Fixed edge case where removing a friend might remove the wrong friend
- Loadout: Fixed icon for NYE Millie

Known Issues

- Desktop VR: Climbing jitter can happen in some cases. Actively working on a fix for this.
- Steam VR users playing on an Oculus headset: When Purchasing Bureau Gold, you will need to take off your headset to approve the purchase
- If you see a notice that you need to "update to play" but don't see it in the store, uninstall and reinstall POP: ONE to force the upgrade to happen. You won't lose any progress or data.

Can't wait to play these new changes with all of you ~ see you in game!

January 21, 2021 Change List

Note: All friend codes will change with this update (we fixed the 0O & I1 issues)

Networking

- Bullets: Fixed issue causing slightly offset bullets (affected shooting at a distance, especially noticeable with the AWP)
- Prediction: General improvements to hit detection
- Movement: Fixed issues where players could severely rubber band with a poor network connection

Reticle

- 4 color presets are now available from Settings -> Weapon Settings (Red, Yellow, Pink, or Green)
- Changing the reticle color will update the world UI Reticle, Reflex Lens, and Tunnel Sights

General

- Squads: Assorted fixes for repeat matchmaking failure while in a squad
- Friend Codes: Removed 0 and 1 from friend codes to avoid confusion
- Friends: Fixed edge case where removing a friend might remove the wrong friend
- Loadout: Fixed icon for NYE Millie

Known Issues

- Desktop VR: Climbing jitter can happen in some cases. Actively working on a fix for this.
- Steam VR users playing on an Oculus headset: When Purchasing Bureau Gold, you will need to take off your headset to approve the purchase
- If you see a notice that you need to "update to play" but don't see it in the store, uninstall and reinstall POP: ONE to force the upgrade to happen. You won't lose any progress or data.

Can't wait to play these new changes with all of you!

Follow on Twitter
Follow on Facebook
Follow on Reddit

node.reviewDescription:
So this game has good graphics and stuff, but I have a few recommendations.

1. You should add a sandbox mode. It would be nice to be able to just hang out and explore the map.
2. You should add a pistol only mode. Basically, the only weapons are pistols. I love using pistols in this game but they’re pretty much useless when it comes to combat.
3. You should add two holsters that don’t take up backpack space. One for a rifle to go on your back, and another for a pistol on your hip. 
4. You should add characters to the store.
5. You should make it a little easier to level up. I’ve been stuck on level 12 for a while now.

That’s it. This is a great game, so keep up the good work!

Sincerely,   
                 MyCatIsADogYes
